effect.shortEffect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.
effect.full: This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it. This ability functions identically to filter.

description.sun-moon: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
description.sword-shield: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
